page.title: 05The Village Policeman.
page.content: Crawford has two policemen.They are Mr Stewart and Mr McDonald.They work with six other policemen who live in nearby villages.They work in Crawford as well as in the surrounding area.The main part of their job is patrolling the A74. A typical day of the 9o'clock shift is checking the paper work,mostly of the previous night's shift for half an hour and then making sure you have your paper work up to date.They then patrol the A74 and various other roads.When they are called to an accident they get the road clear, check to see if there are any other accidents and care for any injured people. Being a policeman in Crawford is a very interesting job.
